description: UAE PINT-AE Spec Registry — Responsibility Matrix v2.0

fields.mandatory_flag_by_use_case: Mandatory for all UAE e-invoicing use cases (B2B, B2G, domestic, export, standard and simplified tax invoices)
fields.format_pattern: Free text identifier. Must be unique per seller. No whitespace-only value. No line breaks.
fields.derivation_logic: Generated by seller's source system (ERP / billing system). Not derived by ASP.
fields.error_message_text: Invoice number (IBT-001) is missing or exceeds maximum length.
fields.mls_relevance: Yes – missing or invalid value results in negative MLS

fields.mandatory_flag_by_use_case: Mandatory for all UAE e-invoicing use cases
fields.derivation_logic: Supplied by seller system. Must represent the legal issue date of the invoice. Not derived by ASP.
fields.error_message_text: Invoice issue date (IBT-002) is missing or not in valid YYYY-MM-DD format.
fields.mls_relevance: Yes – invalid or missing date results in negative MLS

fields.mandatory_flag_by_use_case: Mandatory for all UAE e-invoicing use cases
fields.format_pattern: Must be a valid UN/CEFACT 1001 document type code
fields.derivation_logic: Determined by business scenario in source system (e.g. standard invoice, credit note, debit note). Not derived by ASP.
fields.error_message_text: Invoice type code (IBT-003) is missing or not a valid UN/CEFACT 1001 code.
fields.mls_relevance: Yes – invalid or missing date results in negative MLS

fields.mandatory_flag_by_use_case: Mandatory for all UAE e-invoicing use cases
fields.derivation_logic: Taken from commercial document currency in seller system. Must be consistent with monetary amounts in invoice.
fields.error_message_text: Invoice currency code (IBT-005) is missing or not a valid ISO 4217 code.
fields.mls_relevance: Yes – invalid or missing code results in negative MLS

fields.mandatory_flag_by_use_case: Mandatory for all UAE e-invoicing use cases
fields.format_pattern: UAE national extension code list defined under PINT-AE – BTUAE-02 Transaction Type Code.
fields.derivation_logic: Supplied by seller's business system according to the transaction scenario defined by UAE rules. Not derived by ASP.
fields.error_message_text: Transaction type code (BTUAE-02) is missing or not a valid UAE transaction type value.
fields.mls_relevance: Yes – missing or invalid value results in negative MLS

fields.mandatory_flag_by_use_case: Optional (only present when a due date is defined by payment terms).
fields.derivation_logic: Derived from contractual payment terms in the seller's system. Not derived by ASP.
fields.error_message_text: Payment due date (IBT-009) is not in valid YYYY-MM-DD format.
fields.mls_relevance: No (unless required by a national conditional rule)

fields.mandatory_flag_by_use_case: Mandatory for all PINT-AE invoices (business process identifier must be present).
fields.format_pattern: Valid URI identifying the business process
fields.derivation_logic: Supplied by the sending system to identify the business process context. Not derived by ASP.
fields.error_message_text: Business process identifier (IBT-023) is not a valid URI.

fields.mandatory_flag_by_use_case: Mandatory for all UAE e-invoicing use cases
fields.format_pattern: Valid URI/URN. UAE requirement: Must start with UAE mandated prefix
fields.derivation_logic: Fixed value configured in the sending solution / ASP according to the UAE PINT-AE specification in force.
fields.error_message_text: Specification ID (IBT-024) is missing or not a valid UAE PINT-AE customization identifier.
fields.mls_relevance: Yes – missing or invalid specification ID results in negative MLS.

fields.mandatory_flag_by_use_case: Mandatory when a payment means block is present.
fields.derivation_logic: Determined by the payment method used in the transaction in the seller's system. Not derived by ASP.
fields.error_message_text: Payment means code (IBT-081) is not a valid UNTDID 4461 payment means code.
fields.mls_relevance: No, unless required by a conditional rule.

fields.mandatory_flag_by_use_case: Mandatory for all UAE e-invoicing use cases
fields.derivation_logic: From ERP master data. Not derived by ASP.
fields.error_message_text: Seller name (IBT-027) is missing.

fields.mandatory_flag_by_use_case: Mandatory for all UAE e-invoicing use cases
fields.derivation_logic: From ERP master data. Not derived by ASP.
fields.error_message_text: Seller electronic address (IBT-034) is missing.

fields.mandatory_flag_by_use_case: Mandatory when IBT-034 is present
fields.derivation_logic: Configured by ASP. Not derived from ERP.
fields.error_message_text: Seller electronic address scheme (IBT-034-1) is missing or invalid.

fields.mandatory_flag_by_use_case: Mandatory for all UAE e-invoicing use cases
fields.derivation_logic: From ERP master data. Not derived by ASP.
fields.error_message_text: Seller legal registration ID (IBT-030) is missing.

fields.mandatory_flag_by_use_case: Mandatory when IBT-030 is present
fields.derivation_logic: From ERP master data. Not derived by ASP.
fields.error_message_text: Seller legal registration ID type (BTUAE-15) is missing or invalid.

fields.mandatory_flag_by_use_case: Mandatory for all UAE e-invoicing use cases
fields.derivation_logic: From ERP master data. Not derived by ASP.
fields.error_message_text: Seller TRN (IBT-031) is missing or not in valid 15-digit format.

fields.mandatory_flag_by_use_case: Mandatory for all UAE e-invoicing use cases
fields.derivation_logic: Fixed value configured by ASP.
fields.error_message_text: Seller tax scheme code (IBT-031-1) must be 'VAT'.

fields.mandatory_flag_by_use_case: Mandatory for all UAE e-invoicing use cases
fields.derivation_logic: From ERP master data. Not derived by ASP.
fields.error_message_text: Seller address line 1 (IBT-035) is missing.

fields.mandatory_flag_by_use_case: Mandatory for all UAE e-invoicing use cases
fields.derivation_logic: From ERP master data. Not derived by ASP.
fields.error_message_text: Seller city (IBT-037) is missing.

fields.mandatory_flag_by_use_case: Conditional (recommended for UAE addresses)
fields.format_pattern: AUH, DXB, SHJ, UAQ, FUJ, AJM, RAK
fields.derivation_logic: From ERP master data. Not derived by ASP.
fields.error_message_text: Seller subdivision (IBT-039) is not a valid UAE emirate code.

fields.mandatory_flag_by_use_case: Mandatory for all UAE e-invoicing use cases
fields.derivation_logic: From ERP master data. Not derived by ASP.
fields.error_message_text: Seller country code (IBT-040) is missing or not a valid ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code.

fields.mandatory_flag_by_use_case: Mandatory for all UAE e-invoicing use cases
fields.derivation_logic: From ERP master data. Not derived by ASP.
fields.error_message_text: Buyer name (IBT-044) is missing.

fields.mandatory_flag_by_use_case: Mandatory for all UAE e-invoicing use cases
fields.derivation_logic: From ERP master data. Not derived by ASP.
fields.error_message_text: Buyer electronic address (IBT-049) is missing.

fields.mandatory_flag_by_use_case: Mandatory when IBT-049 is present
fields.derivation_logic: Configured by ASP.
fields.error_message_text: Buyer electronic address scheme (IBT-049-1) is missing or invalid.

fields.mandatory_flag_by_use_case: Conditional (mandatory for B2B domestic invoices)
fields.derivation_logic: From ERP master data. Not derived by ASP.
fields.error_message_text: Buyer TRN (IBT-048) is not in valid 15-digit format.

fields.mandatory_flag_by_use_case: Mandatory when IBT-048 is present
fields.derivation_logic: Fixed value configured by ASP.
fields.error_message_text: Buyer tax scheme code (IBT-048-1) must be 'VAT'.

fields.mandatory_flag_by_use_case: Mandatory for all UAE e-invoicing use cases
fields.derivation_logic: From ERP master data. Not derived by ASP.
fields.error_message_text: Buyer address line 1 (IBT-050) is missing.

fields.mandatory_flag_by_use_case: Mandatory for all UAE e-invoicing use cases
fields.derivation_logic: From ERP master data. Not derived by ASP.
fields.error_message_text: Buyer city (IBT-052) is missing.

fields.mandatory_flag_by_use_case: Conditional (recommended for UAE addresses)
fields.format_pattern: AUH, DXB, SHJ, UAQ, FUJ, AJM, RAK
fields.derivation_logic: From ERP master data. Not derived by ASP.
fields.error_message_text: Buyer subdivision (IBT-054) is not a valid UAE emirate code.

fields.mandatory_flag_by_use_case: Mandatory for all UAE e-invoicing use cases
fields.derivation_logic: From ERP master data. Not derived by ASP.
fields.error_message_text: Buyer country code (IBT-055) is missing or not a valid ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code.

fields.mandatory_flag_by_use_case: Mandatory for all UAE e-invoicing use cases
fields.derivation_logic: Calculated: Σ IBT-131
fields.error_message_text: Sum of line net amounts (IBT-106) does not match sum of line totals.

fields.mandatory_flag_by_use_case: Mandatory for all UAE e-invoicing use cases
fields.derivation_logic: Calculated: Net Base after discounts and charges.
fields.error_message_text: Total amount without tax (IBT-109) is missing or has invalid precision.

fields.mandatory_flag_by_use_case: Mandatory for all UAE e-invoicing use cases
fields.derivation_logic: Calculated: Σ IBT-117
fields.error_message_text: Total tax amount (IBT-110) does not match sum of tax breakdown amounts.

fields.mandatory_flag_by_use_case: Mandatory for all UAE e-invoicing use cases
fields.derivation_logic: Calculated: IBT-109 + IBT-110
fields.error_message_text: Total amount with tax (IBT-112) does not equal IBT-109 + IBT-110.

fields.mandatory_flag_by_use_case: Conditional (mandatory if payment is outstanding)
fields.derivation_logic: Calculated: Net payable including rounding.
fields.error_message_text: Amount due for payment (IBT-115) has invalid precision.

fields.mandatory_flag_by_use_case: Mandatory for all UAE e-invoicing use cases
fields.derivation_logic: Calculated: Sum of line net amounts for the category.
fields.error_message_text: Taxable amount (IBT-116) is missing or incorrect.

fields.mandatory_flag_by_use_case: Mandatory for all UAE e-invoicing use cases
fields.derivation_logic: Calculated: Taxable Amount * Rate / 100
fields.error_message_text: Tax category amount (IBT-117) does not match expected calculation.

fields.mandatory_flag_by_use_case: Mandatory for all UAE e-invoicing use cases
fields.derivation_logic: From ERP tax configuration. Not derived by ASP.
fields.error_message_text: Tax category code (IBT-118) is missing or not in allowed list (S, Z, E, RC).

fields.mandatory_flag_by_use_case: Mandatory for all UAE e-invoicing use cases
fields.derivation_logic: From ERP tax configuration. Must be 5.00 for standard rated.
fields.error_message_text: Tax category rate (IBT-119) is missing or invalid.

fields.mandatory_flag_by_use_case: Mandatory for all UAE e-invoicing use cases
fields.derivation_logic: Generated by seller system. Not derived by ASP.
fields.error_message_text: Line identifier (IBT-126) is missing or duplicated.

fields.mandatory_flag_by_use_case: Mandatory for all UAE e-invoicing use cases
fields.derivation_logic: From transaction data. Not derived by ASP.
fields.error_message_text: Invoiced quantity (IBT-129) is missing or not a valid number.

fields.mandatory_flag_by_use_case: Mandatory when invoiced quantity is present
fields.derivation_logic: From ERP item master data. Not derived by ASP.
fields.error_message_text: Unit of measure code (IBT-130) is missing or not a valid UN/ECE Rec 20 code.

fields.mandatory_flag_by_use_case: Mandatory for all UAE e-invoicing use cases
fields.derivation_logic: Calculated: (Quantity * Net Price) + Charges - Allowances
fields.error_message_text: Line net amount (IBT-131) is missing or calculation mismatch.

fields.mandatory_flag_by_use_case: Mandatory for all UAE e-invoicing use cases
fields.derivation_logic: Calculated: Gross price minus discounts.
fields.error_message_text: Item net price (IBT-146) is missing or invalid.

fields.mandatory_flag_by_use_case: Optional (present when price discount exists)
fields.derivation_logic: From ERP price list. Not derived by ASP.
fields.error_message_text: Item gross price (IBT-148) is not a valid number.

fields.mandatory_flag_by_use_case: Optional (defaults to 1)
fields.derivation_logic: Defaults to 1 if not specified.
fields.error_message_text: Price base quantity (IBT-149) must be a positive number greater than zero.

fields.mandatory_flag_by_use_case: Mandatory for all UAE e-invoicing use cases
fields.derivation_logic: From ERP tax configuration. Must match tax breakdown.
fields.error_message_text: Item tax category code (IBT-151) is missing or not in allowed list.

fields.mandatory_flag_by_use_case: Mandatory for all UAE e-invoicing use cases
fields.derivation_logic: From ERP tax configuration. Must be 5.00 for standard rated.
fields.error_message_text: Invoiced item VAT rate (IBT-152) is missing or invalid.

fields.mandatory_flag_by_use_case: Mandatory for Standard Tax Invoice (UC1) only
fields.derivation_logic: Calculated: Line net amount * VAT rate / 100
fields.error_message_text: VAT line amount (BTUAE-08) is missing or calculation mismatch.

fields.mandatory_flag_by_use_case: Mandatory for all UAE e-invoicing use cases
fields.derivation_logic: From ERP item master data. Not derived by ASP.
fields.error_message_text: Item name (IBT-153) is missing.

fields.mandatory_flag_by_use_case: Optional (recommended for clarity)
fields.derivation_logic: From ERP item master data. Not derived by ASP.
fields.error_message_text: Item description (IBT-154) is missing.
